DOC.brief_title: A Comparison Ongoing Pregnancy Rate Between Cleavage Stage Early Compacting Embryo Transfer 66±2 Hours After ICSI Using Single Step Culture Medium
DOC.detailed_description: A prospective cohort study compare outcome transfer early compacting cleavage day 3 embryo . All participant treat gonadotropin-releasing antagonist protocol accord local protocol . Recombinant follicle stimulate hormone give five day start second third day menstrual cycle start dose individualized participant follow : 150 , 225 300 IU/day , respectively , participant anti-Müllerian hormone level < 2.1 ng/mL , 0.7-2.1 ng/mL < 0.7 ng/mL . This dosage could titrate base clinical judgement investigator . Follicular development monitor use ultrasound scan measurement estradiol progesterone level , start day five stimulation ; scan hormonal measurement repeat every two three day , depend follicle size . An antagonist routinely use day five day human chorionic gonadotropin administration . Criteria administration recombinant human chorionic gonadotropin ( 5,000 IU ) presence least two leading follicle 17 mm diameter . Oocyte retrieval perform 36 hour recombinant human chorionic gonadotropin administration . Insemination perform use intra-cytoplasmic sperm injection three four hour oocyte retrieval ; mature oocyte inseminate . Fertilization check perform inverted microscope 16-18 hour insemination . Embryo evaluation perform day 3 fixed time point fertilization ( 66±2 hour ) use Istanbul consensus . As rule , two useful embryo transfer patient either early compaction still cleavage stage . Early compaction embryo transfer group : transfer 2 utilizable compact embryo . Cleavage stage embryo transfer group : transfer 2 utilizable non-compacting embryo 7-9 cell 20 % fragmentation . Embryo transfer perform use soft catheter standard technique ultrasound guidance . Intensive luteal phase support provide use progesterone gel estradiol . At least 18 day OPU , urinary pregnancy test perform . If pregnancy test positive , vaginal and/or abdominal ultrasonographic investigation perform 35 42 day ( 5 6 week ) ET confirm clinical pregnancy least 70 day ( ≥10 week ) ET confirm ongoing pregnancy . Other clinical parameter also evaluate : serum hormone level , fertilization rate , number quality day 3 embryo , implantation rate , ectopic pregnancy rate miscarriage rate .
DOC.criteria: IVF treatment infertility Controlled ovarian hyperstimulation GnRH antagonist protocol . IVF cycle ≤2 Eligible transfer 2 embryos day 3 Have least 2 embryos 79 cell fragmentation ≤20 % , either early compaction still cleavage stage Oocyte donation cycle Abnormal uterine Using GnRH agonist trigger .
